documentation.text:
@dev Retrieves the messages of the calling user.
 @return An array of Message structures representing the user's messages.

devdoc.details: A smart contract for facilitating secure and decentralized messaging between users.

getUserMessages().details: Retrieves the messages of the calling user.

returns._0: An array of Message structures representing the user's messages.

sendMessage(address,string,bool).details: Sends a message to another user.

params._contentHash: The IPFS hash or off-chain storage reference of the message content.
params._isEncrypted: A boolean indicating whether the message is encrypted.
params._receiver: The address of the user who will receive the message.
